timeline.bodyText: This method is still present in latest ES master, why did you remove it?
timeline.author: mfussenegger

replies.bodyText: Oh, my bad. It was not present at the time of original the pr https://github.com/original-brownbear/elasticsearch/blob/808b8133cf9a7baf58615f0f00ddab402e448169/server/src/main/java/org/elasticsearch/cluster/SnapshotsInProgress.java and i thought it was removed before. It must have been added later. I didn't compare to master. I will add it back.
replies.author: mkleen
